Lab 3 - High-Dimensional Data

Correlation Matrix

8×8 correlation matrix with red/blue color mapping for positive/negative correlations.

View Visualization →

Scatterplot Matrix

7×7 scatterplot matrix with 5 highest-correlation numerical variables and 2 categorical variables.

View Visualization →

Parallel Coordinates

Parallel coordinates display with 10 axes (8 numerical + 2 categorical), ordered by correlation strength between pairs.

View Visualization →

PCA Plot

Principal Component Analysis plot showing top 2 eigenvectors with associated scree plot.

View Visualization →

Biplot

Biplot with 8 projected axes mapped onto the top 2 PCA vectors.

View Visualization →

MDS Data Plot

Multidimensional Scaling visualization of the data points using Euclidean distance.

View Visualization →

MDS Attributes Plot

Multidimensional Scaling visualization of the attributes using 1-|correlation| distance.

View Visualization →
